channel.title: CVE Feed for Dell -- Alienware Command Center (AWCC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dell -- Alienware Command Center (AWCC)

item.title: CVE-2023-28072|2023-09-04T15:38:15.693Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions prior to 5.5.51.0, contain a deserialization of untrusted data vulnerability. A local malicious user could potentially send specially crafted requests to the .NET Remoting server to run arbitrary code on the system.

item.title: CVE-2023-28070|2023-05-03T08:05:51.713Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Alienware Command Center Application, versions 5.5.43.0 and prior, contain an improper access control vulnerability. A local malicious user could potentially exploit this vulnerability during installation or update process leading to privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2023-24569|2023-02-10T12:57:07.328Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center versions 5.5.37.0 and prior contain an Improper Input validation vulnerability. A local authenticated malicious user could potentially send malicious input to a named pipe in order to elevate privileges on the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-0159|2024-06-06T13:06:59.272Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions 5.5.52.0 and prior, contain improper access control vulnerability, leading to Denial of Service on local system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22450|2024-04-10T07:08:12.756Z -- dell -- alienware%20command%20center%20%28awcc%29
item.description: Dell Alienware Command Center, versions prior to 6.2.7.0, contain an uncontrolled search path element vulnerability. A local malicious user could potentially inject malicious files in the file search path, leading to system compromise.
